Hi Oliver,
I've converted the two batch files - xor_train.bat and xor_test.bat
for my Slack box. They are running fairly okay. I guess they should be
okay for UNIX as well.

Regards, Mozaher.


--------  file: xor_train.sh -------------

#!/bin/bash
export MYCLASSPATH=./neat4j.jar:./lib:./lib/log4j.jar:./lib/log4j.properties
echo ${MYCLASSPATH}
java -classpath ${MYCLASSPATH} -Xms256m -Xmx384m
org.neat4j.neat.applications.train.NEATGATrainingManager $1


--------  file: xor_test.sh -------------

#!/bin/bash
export MYCLASSPATH=./neat4j.jar:./lib:./lib/log4j.jar:./lib/log4j.properties
echo ${MYCLASSPATH}
java -classpath ${MYCLASSPATH} -Xms256m -Xmx384m
org.neat4j.neat.applications.test.MSENEATPredictionEngine $1
